item.title: FT Most Read: Friday, September 27, 2024 at 12:30 PM UTC
item.description:
1. UK chancellor ready to water down planned tax raid on ‘non-doms’
2. China’s most advanced nuclear submarine sank in shipyard, says US
3. Ukraine’s new infantry recruits ‘freeze’ in face of Russian onslaught
4. [Opinion] The British state is not fit for Starmer’s purpose
5. Hizbollah’s exploding walkie-talkies probably among many counterfeits, says radio maker
item.guid: FT Most Read: Friday, September 27, 2024 at 12:30 PM UTC
